Situated on Africa's east coast, Kenya has made significant reforms that have driven sustained economic growth and social development over the past decade.
Landlocked country in western Africa. Although Mali is one of the largest countries in Africa, is has a relatively small population.

Officially the Republic of the Niger, this landlocked country in West Africa named after the Niger River, is the largest country in West-Africa.
